thread.title: Facebook CEO plans to appear before Congress: source

title: Facebook CEO plans to appear before Congress: source
text:
Facebook CEO plans to appear before Congress: source Tuesday, March 27, 2018 - 01:49 
Facebook chief executive Mark Zuckerberg will appear before the U.S. Congress to answer questions on data privacy and other issues, but it is not clear to which committee or committees he will testify, a source briefed on the matter said on Tuesday.
